content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had the conversation with a gentleman named Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Max Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in München.
name: Max Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer]
[Question]
[Answer] The final price was not agreed upon, but the last proposed price was 1,125 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer]
[Question]
[Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Peter Schmidt, at 10.
name: Max Müller

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer]
[Question]
[Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.
name: Max Müller
